title: Florida district deploys new math tool
text:
25 Florida district deploys new math tool 
eSchool News: Floridaâ€™s Jackson County School District will deploy LearnBop, a math learning system, to students across the school district.Following the rollout of Digital Jackson, a one-to-one initiative providing Windows 8 tablets to students in grades K-8, the district next focused on interactive learning content.
